metadata.name: Use NTFS Short Name in Image
metadata.comment: Detect use of the Windows 8.3 short name. Which could be used as a method to avoid Image based detection

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.name), lower('~1.bat')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('~1.dll')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('~1.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('~1.hta')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('~1.js')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('~1.msi')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('~1.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('~1.tmp')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('~1.vbe')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('~1.vbs')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('~2.bat')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('~2.dll')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('~2.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('~2.hta')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('~2.js')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('~2.msi')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('~2.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('~2.tmp')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('~2.vbe')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('~2.vbs'))) AND NOT lower(process.parent_process.name) = lower('c:\\windows\\explorer.exe') AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\webex\\webexhost.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\thor\\thor64.exe')) OR lower(process.name) = lower('c:\\progra~1\\winzip\\wzprel~1.exe') OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\vcredi~1.exe'))))

output.summary: Detect use of the Windows 8.3 short name. Which could be used as a method to avoid Image based detection
